oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Man dying from serpent bite photograph, 1982 August 23
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Vance, Mary
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Color photograph of a man laying in bed dying from a serpent bite. The caption on the reverse of the image reads, "Bit Sun. Nite 8 PM Aug 22, 1982; Died Mon 11:15AM Aug. 23, 1982.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region -- Religious life and customs; Appalachian Region -- Social life and customs; Snakebites; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region
